articles.description: A 91-year-old Ohio man went into shock after a vaccination mix-up accidentally left him with two Moderna COVID vaccine shots in the same day.
articles.content:
Image via Getty/Joe Raedle
A 91-year-old Ohio man was rushed to the hospital after he accidentally received two COVID vaccines in one day, WLWT5 reports.

articles.title: Expert Panel Calls for More Smokers to Get Tested for Lung Cancer Starting at 50 Years Old - Gizmodo
articles.description: More people with a long history of smoking should be tested annually for lung cancer, even if they’ve quit in recent years, according to new guidance released Tuesday by a government-backed panel of health experts.
